scripts.bootstrap: npm run install-deps && npm run env && npm run build && npm run docker-rebuild && npm run db-reset-force && npm run support && npm run start
scripts.clear: npm run script clear && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.db-create: docker exec -it -e PGPASSWORD=root achievements-pg psql -U root -c "CREATE DATABASE achievements"
scripts.db-drop: docker exec -it -e PGPASSWORD=root achievements-pg psql -U root -c "DROP DATABASE achievements"; exit 0
scripts.db-recreate: npm run db-drop; npm run db-create
scripts.db-reset: npm run db-recreate && npm run migration-apply && npm run seed-run
scripts.db-reset-force: docker-compose stop pgadmin; docker-compose up -d postgres && sleep 10 && npm run db-reset && docker-compose up -d pgadmin
scripts.reset: npm run clear && yarn install && npm run docker-rebuild && npm run compile
scripts.restart: docker stop $(docker ps -aq --filter 'label=com.etimo-achievements.monitored') && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start-fresh: yarn install && npm run build && npm run openapi && npm run docker-rebuild && npm run db-reset-force && npm run start
